product_name: Mountain Hardwear Chillwave Down Parka - Men's
long_description: The Mountain Hardwear Chillwave down parka is incredibly warm, ruggedly made, and ready for hiking, climbing or snow sports whenever winter weather gets serious. A generous amount of light, compressible 700-fill-power goose down offers substantial warmth. Q.Shield(TM) core technology makes the ripstop nylon shell windproof yet breathable. The water-resistant shell is also reinforced for extra durability in high-wear areas. Versatile hood is insulated and has a full face guard to provide maximum protection; it can also be detached if the weather lets up. One-handed hood and hem drawcords allow quick fit adjustments. A front stormflap and adjustable, partial-elastic cuffs help seal out the elements. Parka is loaded with pockets to store all your essential gear. Mountain Hardwear Chillwave down parka features a baffled construction for maximum loft and warmth.
